title: Walking the Centrist Road with Jamie Kilstein
description:
I have a both hilarious and meaningful chat with comedian Jamie Kilstein. Some amazingly funny moments along with serious ones as well. We speak about his journey towards the political centre, and how to keep intellectually honest in these crazy times
Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Walking-the-Centrist-Road-with-Jamie-Kilstein-e90j5h
Jamie's contact info
TWITTER: http://twitter.com/jamiekilstein/
WEBSITE: http://jamiekilsteinpodcast.com
PATREON: http://www.patreon.com/jamiekilsteinpodcast
Follow me on twitter @AndeaLynnLewis
